word_mean: 两性的，酸碱兼性的：具相反性质的，与酸碱两者相结合的，影响红蓝两种石蕊试纸的

sentence.Network_en: Proteins behave either as acids or bases and are said to be amphoteric.
sentence.Network_cn: 蛋白质习性又像酸又像碱,因此说它是两性的.

sentence.Network_en: Reactions in liquid HF are known that illustrate also amphoteric behavior, solvolysis, or complex formation.
sentence.Network_cn: 已知在液态HF中,也能说明两性行为溶剂分解或络合物形成作用的反应.

sentence.Network_en: Biological activities of amphoteric surfactants to higher or lower organisms were introduced.
sentence.Network_cn: 介绍了两性表面活性剂的生理活性.

铝为两性元素 (amphoteric element),氢氧化铝为两性氢氧化合物,可溶解于酸又可溶解于碱,所以一般分离铝时均利用此性质。因铝的表面常会形成一层氧化铝保护著,故其.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from Greek amphoteros, comparative of amphō 'both', + -ic

means.word_mean: 1. having characteristics of both an acid and a base and capable of reacting as either
